posts.content: AT irs box, perfect working order and still in my bus so can be driven to check etc. in Cornwall and might be able to deliver, but could box up for courier collection.. ... . Â£295

Technophil wrote:Do you know if the box will suit red 9 rear setup?


I have no idea to be honest mate, worth asking in the Tech section here? My van is up on axle stands now so the box is coming out one evening this week ...

I'm just starting on my conversion and only have the gear box so if you are getting rid of any other bits give us a shout

Ta

Out of curiosity, why are you taken it out, and what are you replacing it with?
I have just received a split from the US with a gear box and no engine, so im in a position to choose, im looking for advice on the gear box and engine I can use, im looking for a little more power than the original engine.
john

Only selling as I know have a lovely spec Freeway Flyer box to replace it. It's out of the van now and there is someone coming to look at it tomorrow night ...

What engine you using?
Why did you choose the freeway flyer?
I'm looking to find the best option for my van.

I hope to be down in Cornwall in September so if the gearbox is still available I would be interested in it. Problem is I can be sure this trip will come off. If you sell it in the mean time them I will keep looking but if not I am definitely interested.

Regards
Russell
